subtitle: In this healing light meditation you can direct your attention and light to any
area of your being or life where you need healing.
Take a slow gentle deep breath in and out. Notice where in your body, your mind
or spirit where you might be feeling comfortable, relaxed, or peaceful. Notice
where you may be holding any tension, stress, discomfort, or heaviness. Visualize
light. This may be inside or outside of you or both.
You may consider it love or healing energy. It may be a representative of the
spiritual or divine realm. It may be coming from your higher self, a current
or a past loved one, an animal, or friend. You may experience it as healing light.
It can be any shape, color, or size that is comfortable and supportive for you.
It may be like the warm white golden
sunlight or a star in any galaxy, a crystal,
a gem, or a warm fire.
You may experience this light as all wise and unconditionally loving that
knows exactly what it is you need.
You may experience it as compassionate and accepting. Visualize and see this
light moving into and around your body, wherever you need it to be.
You can allow it to move into your feet, your legs, slowly moving into your torso,
slowly moving into your torso, your arms, and hands.
It may move up into your neck, your head, your face. Let it move to those places
where you would like to feel more alive, pleasant, present, and peaceful.
Allow it to bring you comfort and peace.
Experience this light, perhaps, as pure joy.
Notice what it has to teach you or show you, if anything.
Allow it to move to those areas in your mind, your body, and soul that will be
regenerated by this light.
It may be a general or a specific area of your being that needs this light, or a
specific time and place that needs healing, forgiveness, and eventually
understanding and acceptance.
This light can be any size that is just what is needed for you. It may be the
size of a tip of a needle, or smaller, down to the cellular or subatomic level,
or it may be your whole being, or even as large as the universe.
Feel it relaxing and regenerating you.
Feel it lightening you up.
Feel this interplay of light and dark moving you forward while being steady.
You may experience this light as hope, inspiration, support, creativity, or a
sense of connection, whatever you need.
Be bathed in this light. Be nurtured, restored, and renewed.
Allow your breath to become easier with a fresh perspective.
Allow your emotions to loosen and whatever they may need to be.
Feel yourself, your mind and body revitalized, energized, and calm.
If there is someone or a community with whom
you would like to share this light, someone
who is hurting or in need, share this light with them.
Let it grow and expand at your comfort level.
Notice if there are any messages from this light.
Spend as much time as you would like with this light.
Thank you for being with me.
